author: Staff Reporter
text:
The battle of brains is all set to begin with the pre-event of the 16th edition of The Hindu Young World Quiz 2016 presented by VIT University on Thursday.

To be held at Anna Adarsh College for Women, the event will be conducted in two categories — juniors and seniors — for which registrations start at 9.30 a.m. and 1 p.m. respectively.

Students from classes 4 to 6 can register for the juniors category and students from classes 7 to 9 can register for the seniors category. For details, contact Ph: 94456 05485.
title: The Hindu Young World Quiz today
